properties.description: Site of the container where the appmenu icon will be placed               Values can be: right, left or center               Default: right
properties.name: location

methods.description: Check if the default element style should be applied
methods.name: _setDefaultStyle

methods.description: Sets the height of appBox on desktop
methods.name: _setDesktopHeight

methods.description: Add a close button for small devices
methods.name: _setResponsiveClose

methods.description: Set up declarative user apps items
methods.name: _setupItems

methods.description: Set up span with name of app
methods.name: _setupSpan

methods.description: Position appmenu. *Parent container must have display: flex
methods.name: _updateLocation

methods.description: Add new app node item programmatically
methods.name: addItem

methods.description: Remove node item passed as parameter
methods.name: removeItem

methods.description: Replace old node item with a new one
methods.name: replaceItem
